item.title: Case 4: Products or Services Landing Page
item.description: rentAcar RentAcar is a responsive landing page sample, which was created by typescript and tailwind css. Live Demo Technologies and Skills Typescript React.js Tailwind css Responsive design React-carousel React Hooks Scroll up button Deployment: Deploy web applications on servers like Vercel Homepage Features About us Services Top Cars Book Steps Contact Info More Screenshots Mobile view Book date card Booking Steps About Us Top Cars Footer Getting Started clone this repo npm i npm start Open http://localhost:3000 with your browser to see the result

item.title: Case 3: Technical or Business Blog
item.description: Live about OTC-blog is a demo site for healthy living blog OTC blog is a fully functional multi-purpose blog powered by React and Gatsby JS v3 and flexiBlog theme technologies Algolia search system, Mailchimp newsletter provider and Disqus commenting system are also integrated CMS content API supported Social media sharing supported Deployed on vercel

item.title: Case 2: Social Media App
item.description: About LoveShare is a fancy social media app. Live View Features ScreenShots Login page Mobile view - responsive design Mobile view - sidebar For more info, please check on GitHub ReadMe Live View For more I Created this app following with the youTube channel JavaScript Mastery Deployed on netlify - npm run build, then upload the build file on netlify

item.title: Case 1: E-commerce Website
item.description: About Zonama is a full-featured E-commerce app like amazon Live Demo Technologies Feature Mobile view - responsive design Please check github readme for more GitHub page - - - Note: This project is followed by Basir’s channel on Udemy and modified by Yuxian Xu

item.title: Markdown Formatting Demo
item.description: This example Markdown file compliments of markdown-it.github.io h1 Heading 8-) h2 Heading h3 Heading h4 Heading h5 Heading h6 Heading Horizontal Rules Typographic replacements Enable typographer option to see result. (c) (C) (r) (R) (tm) (TM) (p) (P) +- test.. test… test….. test?….. test!…. !!!!!! ???? ,, – — “Smartypants, double quotes” and ‘single quotes’ Emphasis This is bold text This is bold text This is italic text
